resources.string: We have sent a code to the email you provided. Please enter it below.

How can I create an account?
Step 1: You will need a valid Calvin email address. 
Step 2: Tap on Create Account. 
Step 3: Type in your Calvin email with your desired password (min 8 characters). 
Step 4: Read the terms and conditions and tap on the checkbox to accept the terms and conditions. 
Step 5: Tap on Next. 
Step 6: Please check your email for the verification code and enter the code in the given textbox in the app. 
Optional: If you didn’t receive the verification code, tap on send new code and repeat Step 6. 
Step 7: Tap on finish. 

How can I login to my account? 
Step1: Type your email and password you used while creating an account. 
Step 2: Tap on login. 

How can I message my counselors or peers? 
Step 1: Login to your account. 
Step 2: Tap on “MESSAGING”. 
Step 3: If the person you want to chat with is already in the chat history, go ahead and tap on the message. Otherwise, tap on the “+” button to start a new chat. 
Step 4: Choose the type of chat you want.(Counselors or Peers or Group) 
Step 5: Tap on the person you would like to chat. 

How can I set up an appointment with a counselor or a peer? 
Step 1: Login to your account. 
Step 2: Tap on “APPOINTMENTS”. 
Step 3: Tap on the desired date that you would like to meet with your counselor. 
Step 4: Tap on the “+” button. 
Step 5: Choose the listener you want to meet with. 
Step 6: Enter the time you would like to request.
